subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: P. J. Carlesimo, the Nets’ interim coach, said the best way to persuade owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov to keep him is to do what he did Saturday: win.
snippet: P. J. Carlesimo, the Nets’ interim coach, said the best way to persuade owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov to keep him is to do what he did Saturday: win.
